verses.verse: Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> that you <S%H4672>find;<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4040>roll,<s%> and <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and he caused me to <S%H398>eat<s%> that <S%H4040>roll.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> cause your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> with <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4040>roll<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> you. Then did I <S%H398>eat<s%> it; and it was in my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> as <S%H1706>honey<s%> for <S%H4966>sweetness.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H935>get<s%> you to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with my <S%H1697>words<s%> to them.

For you are not <S%H7971>sent<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of an <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> but to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

Not to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of an <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> you can not <S%H8085>understand.<s%> <S%H518>Surely,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> had I <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to them, they would have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to you.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you; for they <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to me: for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2389>impudent<s%> <S%H4696><s%> and <S%H7186>hardhearted.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and your <S%H4696>forehead<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H4696>foreheads.<s%>

As an <S%H8068>adamant<s%> <S%H2389>harder<s%> than <S%H6864>flint<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H4696>forehead:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> them not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks,<s%> though they be a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H3947>receive<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

And <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H935>get<s%> you to them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, and <S%H559>tell<s%> them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> they will <S%H2308>forbear.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> me up, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> me a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing,<s%> saying, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

I <S%H8085>heard<s%> also the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H2416>creatures<s%> that <S%H5401>touched<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another,<s%> and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>over<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> them, and a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing.<s%>

So the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up, and <S%H3947>took<s%> me away, and I <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness,<s%> in the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> but the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2388>strong<s%> on me.

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> at <S%H8512>Telabib,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> they <S%H3427>sat,<s%> and <S%H3427>remained<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and give them <S%H2094>warning<s%> from me.

When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> You shall surely <S%H4191>die;<s%> and you give him not <S%H2094>warning,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H2421>life;<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Yet <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he <S%H7725>turn<s%> not from his <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> nor from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H7725>Again,<s%> When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man does <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and I <S%H5414>lay<s%> a <S%H4383>stumbling-block<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, he shall <S%H4191>die:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have not given him <S%H2094>warning,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Nevertheless <S%H3588>if<s%> you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man, that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> not, and he does not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> he shall surely <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he is <S%H2094>warned;<s%> also you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> on me; and he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1237>plain,<s%> and I will <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> with you.

Then I <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H1237>plain:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> as the <S%H3519>glory<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H3529>Chebar:<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me, and <S%H5975>set<s%> me on my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with me, and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H935>Go,<s%> <S%H5462>shut<s%> yourself <S%H8432>within<s%> your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But you, O <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5688>bands<s%> on you, and shall <S%H631>bind<s%> you with them, and you shall not <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H8432>among<s%> them:

And I will make your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>sticks<s%> to the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of your <S%H2441>mouth,<s%> that you shall be <S%H481>dumb,<s%> and shall not be to them a <S%H3198>reprover:<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD;<s%> He that <S%H8085>hears,<s%> let him <S%H8085>hear;<s%> and he that <S%H2310>declines,<s%> let him <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
